sentences.sentence: Composition alone can't give you the answer to the question of why is the plywood superior to the solid pine board.
sentences.translation: 只用组成成分无法解答为什么胶合板要优于松木板这个问题。

sentences.sentence: Which one has the superior mechanical properties? The plywood. Why?
sentences.translation: 哪一个的力学属性更好,胶合板的，为什么？

sentences.sentence: No cheap-looking plywood box or precious playhouse on stilts would do.
sentences.translation: 例如，看似廉价的胶合板盒子，像我准备建造的在树桩上的儿童游戏房。
